definition: A term used to refer to an individual involved in a legal process, specifically someone who has been formally accused of committing a crime and is currently facing charges in a court of law.

examples.german: Der Angeklagte hat seine Unschuld beteuert.
examples.english: The accused has pleaded his innocence.

examples.german: Der Angeklagte wurde zu einer Haftstrafe verurteilt.
examples.english: The accused was sentenced to imprisonment.

examples.german: Der Angeklagte hat ein Alibi vorgebracht.
examples.english: The accused has presented an alibi.

examples.german: Der Angeklagte hat die Tat gestanden.
examples.english: The accused has confessed to the crime.
